name: The Werewolf Hills
detailed_description:
Go in this FPS adventure protecting yourself against the dangers with varius weapons like pistols, crossbows, explosives, etc. You will need to look for ammo, items and other useful stuff in dangerous places for survive and as you go, you will be discover the mysteries of that hill.

Synopsis
You are driving in the mountains and you get lost on a road hill, the car is being out of fuel and you dont know what to do. Your only option will be search for help, but something bad are happening in the nearest town.
As you go, you will notice that the hills are invaded of dangerous sectarians and also a fierce monster, so get help wont be so easy, you will need to search for weapons and kill them if you dont want to die.
Finally the night comes and you hear a fierce howl..
about_the_game:
Go in this FPS adventure protecting yourself against the dangers with varius weapons like pistols, crossbows, explosives, etc. You will need to look for ammo, items and other useful stuff in dangerous places for survive and as you go, you will be discover the mysteries of that hill.

short_description: The Werewolf Hills is a First Person Shooter that tells the adventure of a person that get lost in a misteryous mountain where a monster lays in the nights.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 980/ ATI Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 - 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
